mapper.insert: insert into t_order(order_number, user_id, payment_type, total_money, name, area, detail_address, phone, fixed_phone, postcode, coupon_id) values (#{order.orderNumber}, #{order.userId}, #{order.paymentType}, #{order.totalMoney}, #{order.name}, #{order.area}, #{order.detailAddress}, #{order.phone}, #{order.fixedPhone}, #{order.postcode}, #{order.couponId});
mapper.select: select order_id, order_number, user_id, payment_status, payment_type, total_money, create_time, name, area, detail_address, phone, fixed_phone, postcode, order_status, coupon_id, gift_point, delete_status from t_order where delete_status = 0 and order_id = #{orderId}
